settings.name: MakeSeleList
settings.select: A.[BookingID],A.[BookingCode],A.[BookingName],A.[BookingInTime] ,A.[BillTypeID], dbo.f_Getcodename('优先度',A.PRI) PRI, dbo.f_Getcodename('维修类型',A.BillTypeID) BillTypeName, A.[RunDistance],A.BookingFashion, A.[RepairDescribe],A.ArriveTime,A.StayExplain,A.StayTime, A.[SignCode],A.[CustomerID],A.ArriveTime,C.CustomerName,C.MobileTel, A.[RepairName],A.[RepairTel],A.[Address],A.[InputName],A.[InputTime],A.[BillState]
settings.from: S_Booking AS A LEFT JOIN B_Customer AS C ON A.CustomerID=C.CustomerID
